/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
